summary:
This conversion was made by esmm40 who PM'd me the converted meshes so I can add them to this thread. Thanks!

Required mods:
DFSL/cenobite Full Metal Bikini (Halo's Mods)

How to get it:
Console + help bikini
Craftable on elven section

Version 0.2: fixed lighting issue on thong. Ad
